sections.content: Cross Country Ski Trail Conditions as of February 25, 2026 –

The trail will be groomed today for classic and skate skiing. The connector trail from the ski center to Bucks Run is no longer available.  Please know that you will have to walk to the start of the trail.  For your safety and the safety of our staff please adhere to Bucks Run hours.  Bucks Run is open Monday – Friday 12 pm – 7:45 pm and Saturday – Sunday 9 am – 7:45 pm, weather and conditions permitting.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Perfect classic tracks! Thank you to the groomers at Huron Meadows. The skate lane was also great.

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails will be groomed and tracked this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Night Skiing is Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: It is full on winter in Northern Michigan. We have been blanketed with snow on the ground and in the trees. Late yesterday 5 inches of snow accumulated at Nub's. The majority of this snow has been groomed in the base, but some of it is sitting on top of the corduroy. If you like a nice dusting of snow on top head for Pintail Peak as this area was groomed first. The lodge at Pintail is open with an espresso bar and great food options. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. with an hour break at 4:30. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
